api_list.name: keepalive
api_list.description: This endpoint must be called once every 7 days, so that the webhook service continues to operate.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://bc-real-time-pipedrive-com-filtering.p.rapidapi.com/keepAlive"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "bc-real-time-pipedrive-com-filtering.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: (Internal) Push webhook
api_list.description:
This is an "internal webhook".  
It should not be directly called.  
It exists only for internal purposes, to push the right webhook at the right moment.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://bc-real-time-pipedrive-com-filtering.p.rapidapi.com/bcForwardWebhookToClient"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "bc-real-time-pipedrive-com-filtering.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
